name: 2018 Interest Rate Hike
text: Central bank raised rates in 2018. Market risk exposure increased. Credit spreads widened. Liquidity stress in emerging markets. Recommendations: increase capital buffer, reprice floating-rate products, hedge long-term exposure.

name: 2020 Inflation Spike
text: Rapid inflation surge in 2020. Market risk and operational risk. Supply chain disruption. Credit quality deterioration. Actions: stress test portfolios, review counterparty limits, enhance operational resilience.

name: Liquidity Crisis Scenario
text: Severe liquidity crunch. Funding stress. Market risk and liquidity risk. Asset fire sales. Bank run scenario. Mitigation: maintain high-quality liquid assets, diversify funding sources, contingency funding plan.

name: Credit Default Wave
text: Credit risk event. Widespread corporate defaults. Credit portfolio stress. Economic downturn. Increase provisions, tighten underwriting, reduce concentration risk.

name: Fraud and Operational Failure
text: Operational risk and fraud. Internal control failure. Unauthorized trading. Reputational damage. Strengthen controls, audit trails, segregation of duties, fraud detection.

name: Market Crash and Volatility
text: Market risk. Equity and bond market crash. High volatility. Margin calls. Value at risk exceeded. Hedge positions, reduce leverage, diversify across asset classes.

name: Regulatory Capital Shortfall
text: Capital adequacy at risk. Regulatory breach. Credit and market risk weights increased. Capital buffer below requirement. Raise capital, optimize risk-weighted assets, retain earnings.
